website_summaries.verdict: This one-of-a-kind squirrel feeder makes a bold statement in any outdoor setting.
pros: Hanging squirrel feeder is simple to set up in just minutes
Unique horse head design is sure to capture your attention
Provides a distinct outdoor decoration as well as a practical feeder
cons: Hole for hanger is very small
Less durable than many comparable feeders

customer_reviews.title: Clowning on Squirrels
customer_reviews.text: Good price and very funny! Recommendations: use peanut butter, make sure it's closer to 9 inches off the ground and try and use a wire type hanging apparatus. They will be able to chew through string or rope.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Horsey mcHorseFace
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised - the squirrels love it, I love it and all my facebook friends love it, who could ask for more? I've been experimenting with what to put in it. Currently i'm trying sunflower seeds mixed with peanut butter to help hold the sides in the head and slow down the squirrels a bit (greedy little buggers eat like the end of the world is coming. Hysterical. Joe Bob says check it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Berkun

customer_reviews.title: The description for this squirrel feeder left out one point ...
customer_reviews.text: The description for this squirrel feeder left out one point. It does not come with the cord you hang it from. The hole is so small a heavy duty shoe lace won't fit through it....hunting for a cord now that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Cool while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't advise that you add peanut butter inside it as the instructions suggest. If you make it difficult for the squirrels to get to the food, theyll find another way. In my case, they chewed a giant hole thru the horse head. Do not follow those instructions u less you want your squirrel feeder ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: FYI-squirrels do NOT find it as funny as I did. They ate the top of the head off within a few days of hanging it. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my Dad as a gift, ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my Dad as a gift, along with the peanuts and corn and the shepard's hook to hang it on. It was the funniest gift of the day! Everyone thought it was a hoot!
customer_reviews.author: Michelina

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Well unfortunately the only thing it's good for is to feed the squirrels. And by that I mean the squirrels ate the head the face the ears everything it's just a hanging piece of plastic junk. Never did I see one squirrel inside of it like the cool video. Just being destroyed by squirrels eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: They eat the plastic :(
customer_reviews.text: This is a funny idea and I got a hoot out of it until I realized my furry friends were injesting the plastic this thing is made of. I don't know if they survived, as I haven't seen the ones that I came to recognize as eating out of the horse head, but even if they did there is now plastic spread around in their fecal matter. All the plastic ever created still exists on the planet because it doesn't decompose. I hope the company that makes this will make it out of metal, glass, or ceramic in the future to continue helping us enjoy our furry friends without destroying them and our shared environment.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha S. Thiessen

customer_reviews.title: A perfect White Elephant gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a White Elephant Christmas exchange, and it was so hilarious I was going to try to have my partner or I steal it back so we could go home with it, but my younger step brother fell in love with it when he opened it, and I didn’t have the heart to take it from him. It’s exactly as advertised: a somewhat unsettling horse head to feed squirrels out of. Definitely a unique and amusing gift to bring to a White Elephant game.
customer_reviews.author: Errorka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Dad who is confined to his bed. He absolutely loves watching the squirrels trying to eat from this. It has provided many of hilarious moments for him. The feeder is very sturdy. I would recommend placing a smear of peanut butter to help hold the food in place so it does not sling out too easy for the squirrels. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, what a wonderful addition to our back yard. I bought this as a gift for my retired parents and it has brought us endless living room window fun. We love sending each other photos of the squirrel in the head. Took them a few days to find it, but now we have 1-2 squirrels that visit everyday. Just this morning we found one squirrel chewed through the front of the nose! Loved it too hard. Oh boy. Such good fun. Can’t wait to see a squirrel inside through the nose “window” now!
customer_reviews.author: bbb

customer_reviews.title: This injured the squirrel!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom on her birthday. About 2 hours after we hung it up, it was no longer hanging, it had fallen While the squirrel was in it. the squirrel got injured and there were drops of blood on the ground. There were also a bunch of holes in the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my friend for her birthday. Kind of as a joke but she absolutely loved it. She is always fighting the squirrels in her yard to stay away from her birdfeeder so this is a little way to get some revenge on them.
customer_reviews.author: mommaO

customer_reviews.title: This was a neat idea, but not well engineered ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a neat idea, but not well engineered. Hole in head to put a hanger is too small. N head is not well balanced, the squirrels won't go in it.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE l.BUrns

customer_reviews.title: TOO FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! I have squirrels who are "sharing" my garden and the advice is to feed them, the idea that feeding them what you want the squirrels to have means they aren't eating what you don't want them to eat. I thought why not have fun while keeping the little fuzzy suckers away from my garden!? It's a double win!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perreault

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately the squirrels loved it too
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately the squirrels loved it too, because they chewed a hole through the nose and stole the food the easy way. It was fun while it lasted, though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: They ate the head too!
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm, it's a squirrel feeder... but the squirrels eat the actual horse head!! Waste of money! Plus the seller wouldn't give me a refund because "the warranty doesn't cover damage from wildlife." Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: If it's possible he had a little too much fun watching this and the squirrel he was trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for my father in law. If it's possible he had a little too much fun watching this and the squirrel he was trying to get out of his bird feeders!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Baker

customer_reviews.title: I love it more then the squirrels
customer_reviews.text: I loved this horse head ever since I first saw it. It is a quality piece. Made sturdy. It’s been hanging for over a month and my squirrels are scared to death of it. They will not go near it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morse

customer_reviews.title: We were excited to see the antics when we hung ...
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to see the antics when we hung this. Unfortunately, not much has happened. Both our gray and typically more aggressive red squirrels seem cautious. We've watched a couple stick their heads in but they don't stay long. Maybe we just have cautious squirrels but I probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska reader

customer_reviews.title: Just as funny as the YouTube Videos.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for our 88 year old grandpa. We thought what do you get a 88 year who has everything, well you get him a horse head squirrel feeder. Like most of you we watched the YouTube videos and lol'd. We thought this would be great for him to watch in his yard and guess what, WE WERE RIGHT! The feeder is easy enough to load and provides him with countless hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great gag gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gag gift option. Or for Halloween. Or as seen on the show Cheaters, apparently a good option for Tinder Dates as well (I don't know who that person is, just saw it on TV after I bought mine!)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: and we were not disappointed. There has been a great deal of laughter ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a family member who loves horses and squirrels, and we were not disappointed. There has been a great deal of laughter over this feeder, and I can't wait to receive picture updates. The only thing that needs to be settled is what to call the squirrel-horse combo. Horrel? Or squorse?
customer_reviews.author: gv

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is just a fun feeder. I fill it with peanuts to keep the squirrels entertained and out of my bird feeders. And it does work. The squirrels will put their heads up into it, to get the food.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST!!!!!!!! We have one and we also go one for my parents and my in-laws. It's hysterical!!!!! Use peanut butter to help the feed stick. FYI, my dog and deer also try to eat out of it. Also, watch the fluctuating price. I paid $30 for each of mine, then two weeks later, it went up to $50 on Amazon. When I last looked, it was just shy of $20.
customer_reviews.author: Hubs and Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Nice novelty
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son. He had a number of squirrels running around his yard. Hang it the correct height, put some peanut butter in it. Wait for horse head squirrel.
customer_reviews.author: Henry H.

customer_reviews.title: Picked up for office White Elephant exchange
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a great white elephant gift. The recipient, not so much. Unfortunately, for both the recipient and myself, the judge thought the twerking santa was funnier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my parents and got it delivered to their house. By the time I visited them a month later, half of the horse's face had been chewed off by squirrels, which was a little disturbing. Before the carnage, they luckily took a video of a squirrel getting food out of the horse head which was as hilarious as I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It's way smaller than I expected which I guess it's my own fault but it doesn't hold any food hardly either. I would purchase a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Anytime Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so dang entertaining. We needed something to lift the spirits of my son after he broke his arm, and this did the trick. Peanut butter + sunflower seeds= endless amount of fun.
customer_reviews.author: BWest

customer_reviews.title: Very amusing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use peanut butter or anything messy... I just put a bunch of mixed nuts into it and wait for some brave little squirrel souls to work up the nerve to check it out. Adorable!
customer_reviews.author: sourpuss

customer_reviews.title: Same as photo shows
customer_reviews.text: well it is exactly as the photo shows. I wishbit had come with a little string to hang it. Finishing line works well. It actually scared my squirrels away.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan bergami

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift exchange!
customer_reviews.text: No clue if it works or anything, all I know is I used it as a company fun gift. Everyone wanted it and it was shuffled around through the remaining gift choices. Prefect for why I bought it. Will update once I hear how it goes in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Big Willy B

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly funny to watch with squirrels
customer_reviews.text: The squirrels ate through the teeth in first few minutes, but I glued aluminum foil in its place with a duct tape backing and no more issues
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: was a hit at the white elephant friend gift exchange
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was funny, and bought it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was funny, and bought it, but the squirrel is blind to oncoming danger while inside. We had a hawk almost get one while it was in this, so I took it down. Looks hilarious if in a safe place
customer_reviews.author: melinda hester

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, but no match for motivated squirrels
customer_reviews.text: We had a blast watching our squirrel-horses go "nuts" with this feeder; however, they got a bit aggressive with it and ripped Trigger's nose off within the week, and we had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: GSP and Dane Lady

customer_reviews.title: Feeding Frenzy ...
customer_reviews.text: TOO TOO GOOD. The squirrels love it! We had about 15 squirrels in the yard. It was a feeding frenzy.. we also had birds, rabbits and chipmunks. Only squirrels put their heads in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome White Elephant Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a white elephant gift for a work Christmas party. Everyone got a good laugh when it was unwrapped and sparked a few steals. Very sturdy material, am considering getting one for my own home.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice gag gift, but....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it looked like fun. The food drops out when the wind blows and I think it scares the squirrels, they never got interested in it. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma bear

customer_reviews.title: Funny
customer_reviews.text: Great product but when we put a bit of peanut butter inside our squirrels ate the entire head. They are ravenous little things! Maybe stick to dry foods inside so your horse isnt eaten as well.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this! I cannot wait to give it to my parents for Christmas. Their yard squirrels will give them hours of fun now instead of constant aggravation! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious and nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: I could not stop laughing at this. I purchased this for a white elephant gift and I might just steal it!
customer_reviews.author: Betg1123

customer_reviews.title: Awesome white elephant gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a white elephant exchange. It was by far the favorite gift! And my sister uses it and loves watching the squirrels freak out over it. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda roth

customer_reviews.title: what's not to love? In the off-season we put it on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, what's not to love? In the off-season we put it on a bottle of wine to freak out dinner guests.
customer_reviews.author: Tomorrow's Man

customer_reviews.title: they were always getting into the bird feeders but we enjoy watching them
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is hilarious. We have a large family of grey squirrels, they were always getting into the bird feeders but we enjoy watching them. This product makes it even better to watch the squirrels in the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Squirrels not using it like picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks funny. But I dont seem to find the squirrels eating out of it like in the picture on box. They seem kind of cautious about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We have a squirrel around our house that likes to stare into our windows. We have named him bob. I can now laugh hysterically as I watch bob eat. :D
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V.

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for Christmas, for her backyard squirrel. Took the squirrel a few time to finally stick his head all the way in and when It finally happened It did not disappoint. Great funny gift!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Super funny and practical
customer_reviews.text: This was a hilarious white elephant gift that everyone fought over. I ended up stealing my own gift and it works great for the squirrels. It don’t know how many laughed I’ve gotten out of this!
customer_reviews.author: Drew H-M

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, great for some laughs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gag gift for my aunt. She loves it! It's so much fun to watch the squirrels get up inside and push it around. We laugh for embarrassingly long time.
customer_reviews.author: Techno_Babble_3.14

customer_reviews.title: this is fun, but we lost interest within a week or ...
customer_reviews.text: So, this is fun, but we lost interest within a week or so. Maybe our squirrels are extra smart (doubt it) but they've learned to dump most of the peanuts onto the ground without putting their head in. It might work better if there were a lip inside to hold the peanuts in place?
customer_reviews.author: writeZoe

customer_reviews.title: I recommend using the peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Once the squirrels figured it out, it was hilarious to watch! I recommend using the peanut butter, that way they stay in the head for an extra few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun for a short time but the squirrels chewed it up. :-(
customer_reviews.author: ie

customer_reviews.title: Great product that gives laughs for about a year
customer_reviews.text: Great product that gives laughs for about a year. Fades in the sun and events the squirrels ate through it. Worth it for the laughs and shock factor, not long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: JadeFox85

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious and fun
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like?? I haven’t seen a squirrel eating from it yet but give them time to figure it out. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Doretta

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Horse’s muzzle isn’t as long as pictured. Thus can only store a few peanuts in it. No string included to hang it either.
customer_reviews.author: J W Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with a string to hang it, but that was no big deal as we had some fishing line. Super cute to watch the squirrels get up in there.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out very well
customer_reviews.text: The peanuts were just knocked out by the squirrels, my squirrels were smarter than the cute one in video demo
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: I have 25 or 30 squirrels in my yard. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 25 or 30 squirrels in my yard. Maybe mine are spoilt, because I feed them a couple times a week but they never did play with this item.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Adorible rodent feeder.
customer_reviews.text: My dad insisted on one of these for his front yard, so I bought it for him. In all honesty, it is adorable. The squirrels obviously love it, too. My one complaint is there is only a single hole in the top for hanging, so it's difficult to keep still, and it wants to spin on the string.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Turner

customer_reviews.title: Mystery horse head.like in the godfather... sorta.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even remember buying this product but it looks hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Seedude

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a gag gift for someone and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gag gift for someone and he actually placed it outside even though he hates squirrels.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It funny, and got lots of laughs and funny looks ...
customer_reviews.text: It funny, and got lots of laughs and funny looks from people- as we hung it with fishing wire from a tree. However, never saw a squirrel use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a White Elephant gift this Christmas and I wish I had just kept it, it was so cool! The expression on the person's face when they opened the gift was wonderful. It's well made and really unique.. :D Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious. bought this for a gag gift for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious. bought this for a gag gift for a white elephant Christmas party. I was hoping to end up with it but it didn't happen. It seemed to be a hit though.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for the 4 days it lasted before the squirrels chewed right through it. It would help if the plastic was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Brit

customer_reviews.title: Funny funny funny
customer_reviews.text: It took the squirrels and birds a couple of days to figure out what the heck this was. We put peanut butter in it and the squirrels came! Funny funny funny. Great source of entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: SBOH

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it.
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be my person entry to the yankee swap at the work party. Can't wait to see who ends up picking this!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Diane

customer_reviews.title: Funny, but not too durable
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in good time and well packaged. It was funny when the squirrels ate out of it, but then when I hadn't filled it in a few days, the squirrels chewed off the horse head's muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used fishing line to hang from a tree. Works perfect. Sooo funny
customer_reviews.author: Gailbriella

customer_reviews.title: The squirrels chewed right through the top of the horse ...
customer_reviews.text: The squirrels chewed right through the top of the horse head rather than sticking their head up through the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyC

customer_reviews.title: This was awesome, until the squirrels decided that climbing in to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome, until the squirrels decided that climbing in to get the nuts was too much and chewed off the nose :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too funny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a white elephant gift exchange at work. The person that got it loves it. All the others were jealous they didn't get it. I showed everyone a YouTube video with this product. So funny!
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: Funny
customer_reviews.text: Put peanut butter with bird seed inside and within a matter of minutes a squirrel arrived and stuck his head in. It was good for a laugh. Not as funny the second time around.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gag Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for office gag gift exchange. The lady that received it loved it! Fast Fast Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to give it to my cousin.
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to give it to my cousin for Christmas. They have a nature "feedery" outside their kitchen window and enjoy watching all the squirrels and birds. This should add some additional amusement to their day.
customer_reviews.author: CNINGHM

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to watch them feed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 98 year old neighbor who loves to feed squirrels. It's fun to watch them feed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gag gift at Christmas and they LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gag gift at Christmas and they LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lmao.
customer_reviews.text: Lmao is all I really need to say. Got this as a white elephant gift, excited for someone to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ghannam

customer_reviews.title: and thinks they should feel satisfied enough not to steal the bird's food
customer_reviews.text: My guy has been in a constant battle with the squirrels in our yard. He feeds them daily, and thinks they should feel satisfied enough not to steal the bird's food. I bought this for his entertainment and think that this will be a big hit on Christmas day. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Scarley313

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for some hilarity in your life you have to get one of theses.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a white elephant gift?
customer_reviews.text: Fun white elephant gift - they fought over it! Goofy and fun! It would be great to actually see it in use!
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: squirreltastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a white elephant party. The person who ended up with it was so happy! She even traded a very nice gift because she just had to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen D

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it really does work, and it's as funny as you would think!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Follow the instructions for mounting and filling (use a little peanut butter to keep the other food, if any, in place), and it works like a charm. After the squirrels got used to the new addition to the yard, they were performing for my delight - lots of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Rumpf

customer_reviews.title: Great white elephant gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a white elephant gift and it was a hit! Everyone wanted it! I need to order one for myself, hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Mary GR

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift but..
customer_reviews.text: Our squirrels don't seem very interested. We've tried enticing them with peanut butter and whole shelled peanuts but they seem leary. It's been up for a couple of weeks now but still not much activity. Kind of bummed considering the price :(
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McKee

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for everyone this year. Total hit! Hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: AmyJ

customer_reviews.title: Funny, a great laugh!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, this thing is hilarious, but the squirrels have yet to figure it out. I also hear the squirrels eat through the. Ose to get to the food. I really hope that does. Ot happen as I have not kept mine up this winter
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just funny
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually buy these gaudy items,but,my husband thought it was the funniest thing he ever saw, so I had to get it for a Christmas gag gift. He laughs each time he sees it.
customer_reviews.author: cbass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and was working or in the condition so described in advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Derald G.

customer_reviews.title: You Need This Squirrel Feeder!
customer_reviews.text: Funniest purchase I've made in awhile. The neighbors, especially the children, all love it! This head has provided hours of laugh out loud laughter already! Arrived speedily too, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So funny! !
customer_reviews.text: Just as in youtube videos gave as a gift everyone was thrilled Can't wait to see it in person.
customer_reviews.author: seahag

customer_reviews.title: FTW
customer_reviews.text: Do you even have to look at the feedback to know this is the most awesome horse head squirrel feeder on the market? Nope. But you did look. And I will tell you it is adorable, sturdy, and a good excuse to feed the neighborhood squirrels.
customer_reviews.author: Moosebunny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious, a little smaller than I was expecting but makes sense for squirrel proportions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a HOOT! Fun while it lasted, the squirrels chewed through the nose.
customer_reviews.text: Fun while it lasted. Squirrels had a heyday with it but the party was over when they decided it was easier to just chew through the nose to get at the peanut butter and seeds.
customer_reviews.author: David Meekhof

customer_reviews.title: But it's still a funny product
customer_reviews.text: Wish they'd just add the string with it. But it's still a funny product
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious! We needed to put it on something more ...
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious! We needed to put it on something more stable, though, so the squirrels can get up there without the head swinging.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing! Obviously someone else did too, because they stole it from my yard... 😢
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious! Purchased for my dad and he loves it. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni S. Hinz

product_meta.title: Accoutrements Horse Head Squirrel Feeder
product_meta.description: Size:StandardWe all know how funny the Horse Mask is and how well it sells. Well, it turns out it's even funnier on a squirrel. This hanging vinyl 6-1/2" x 10" (16.5 cm x 25.4 cm) squirrel feeder makes it appear as if any squirrel that eats from it is wearing a Horse Mask. You'll laugh every morning as you drink your coffee while staring out the window into your backyard. Hole on top for hanging with string (not included).
feature_bullets: Squirrel stands on hind legs to eat, looks like it's wearing horse mask

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars673 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
